entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
